body:
This is a hotfix release. While, in theory, I could release another revision instead, this ensures that people joining servers will be notified of their incompatibility and have all the necessary bugfixes.

- Fixed flying units not attacking
- Fixed bridge mechanics
- Fixed invisible/missing players on multiplayer
- Fixed multiplayer crashes
- Fixed pathfinding crashes
- Fixed pathfinding not working for friendly units
- Fixed many other common issues
name: 4.0 Build 96
